channel.title: Hyperion Question please help! (Unsolved)
channel.description:
Okay when I try to use eclipse to open the server I don't get the option I need.
[img]http://C:\Users\Tyler FTW\Pictures\Hyperion1[/img]
And when I try running the server without it I get this error.
[img]http://C:\Users\Tyler FTW\Pictures\Hyperion2[/img]
I don't have org.hyperion.Server as an option. If anyone knows how to fix I'd be very happy :)
If you can't see pictures the problem happens when I try to search for a main class for the server. org.hyperion.Server isn't in the list yet I need it to run the server. The error I get tells me I need org.hyperion.Server so if anyone knows how to fix this again I'd be very happy :)

item.title: Hyperion Question please help! (Unsolved)
item.dc:creator: @scipyo scipyo
item.description:

Okay when I try to use eclipse to open the server I don’t get the option I need.
